title: Turn It Off
itunes:title: Turn It Off
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
One of the simple joys of childhood is adventuring with friends. But even when you stay close to home, close enough to feel safe, the darkness still creeps in...

 

***

Credited to Polum Chill and guest narrated by Owen McCuen

***

Subscribe to the show on YouTube at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ3SrH_3fsROXFAjomKcUtw

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod or creepypod.com/support

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
